description:
A great first road bike for the drop-bar curious. Built on a frame that's a proven performer, the CAAD Optimo 4 lets you enjoy the geometry and handling the high-end road bike, while saving some money for kit. The Shimano’s Claris drivetrain gives you instant access to your 18 gears, so a hill will never catch you by surprise. Promax brakes keep the potential speed of your new road bike right where you want it. And the versatile geometry means this bike can double as a sporty commuter, for those who want to inject speed into their daily rides.

  • Smartform C2 alloy frame with a carbon blade fork and performance cyclocross geometry
  • Shimano Claris groupset with FSA Tempo cranks
  • Promax RC-452 dual pivot caliper brakes offer plenty of stopping power
  • 2x8 drivetrain pairs 50-34T chain rings with an 11-30T cassette
  • SAVE™ Micro-suspension uses strategically engineered flex zones in the rear triangle to smooth out the ride
  • Subtle rack and Fender mounts in the rear triangle
  • Vittoria Zaffiro tires have confidence inspiring traction and a smooth roll
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
